text:
The Kalai Ilakkiya Peru Mandram at its state executive meeting held here on Sunday, has urged the Centre to take steps to withdraw the case registered against Kanhiah Kumar, president of Jawharlal Nehru University Students’ Union. A resolution, adopted in this regard, said the false cases should be withdrawn. Writer Chandrakanthan presided over the meeting. Ajay Kumar Ghosh, district president, spoke.

Complaint cell

A toll-free complaint cell 18004257031 has been set up for receiving election-related complaints. In a release issued here on Sunday, K. Nandakumar, Collector, said that 12 committees had been set up for free and fair conduct of elections. He also said that GPRS equipment had been fitted to the vehicles of committee officials for monitoring the movement of the officials.

Body recovered

The Fire Service Rescue personnel, on Sunday night, recovered the body of a 15-year-old boy Mujibur Rahman, who had drowned at Pallavan Kulam in the town. Police said the boy, along with a few friends, went to the tank to take bath. Although three boys escaped to safety, Mujibur Rahman had drowned.
title: “Withdraw case”
